title: [LFT] Low elo support main looking for team
body:
I'm looking to join a team for ranked 5s. I play Thresh, Nami and Leona. Thresh is my main and I will always use him unless he's picked or banned, but I am still capable of using the other 2 quite well. I am currently bronze 3, but I am comfortable playing with and against people up to high silver. I can sometimes do higher, but I don't want to be the bronze on a team of golds and hold people back. If it's needed, I can be a substitute ADC as I play a large amount of it in normals. I can comfortably play most ADCs, with best being Vayne, Corki, Caityln, Twitch, Jinx.

My summoner is UnholyDemigod, feel free to add me if you're looking for a support. I don't use these forums so I probably won't see any replies. If you wish to message me I'm on reddit with the same username
